ygData.subject: Re: Yet another "Where Should I Hunt?" question....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If uncamped, yes, a good opportunity. Otherwise, Highhold Pass is good for about 2 more levels (once you hit 22, you get pitiful experience), at either
ygData.messageBody:
According to PHAEDRA WHITLOCK:
> South Karana. Hunt aviaks, centaurs and elephants until you can get into outside Paw Groups. Ive levelled from 22 to nearly 28 (last night) in about 3 weeks at Paw. The loot is good (FS weapons, whips sell for 30-50, gloves for 300-500, other Paw armor 10-15) and the money isnt bad, plat, gold and silver.

If uncamped, yes, a good opportunity.

Otherwise, Highhold Pass is good for about 2 more levels (once you hit 22,
you get pitiful experience), at either Gnoll side (solo or small group)
or Orc side (join one of the big groups that camp there)

Picklaws at 20 is borderline, even the early groups, you'll get loads
of resists, as they're all red.

--
Vincent Archer Email: archer@...

All men are mortal. Socrates was mortal. Therefore, all men are Socrates.
(Woody Allen)
